Token.Abstract: The PTPusherDelegate protocol can be implemented to receive important events in a PTPusher object's lifetime.
Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has connected to the Pusher service successfully.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has disconnected from the Pusher service.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance failed to connect to the Pusher service.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance is about to attempt reconnection.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The connection for the pusher instance.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate of the request that will be used to authorize access to a channel.
Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has subscribed to the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was subscribed to.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance has unsubscribed from the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was unsubscribed from.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that the PTPusher instance failed to subscribe to the specified channel.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that has connected.

Parameter.Name: channel
Parameter.Abstract: The channel that was subscribed to.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The error returned when attempting to subscribe.

Token.Abstract: Notifies the delegate that an error event has been received.

Parameter.Name: pusher
Parameter.Abstract: The PTPusher instance that received the event.
